title: ISecondaryMemberBetweenPointsFeatureData.DistanceMember1
description: Gets and sets the offset from the end of the first member of the primary structure system member pair.
returns: 0.0 <= Offset from end of first member <= length of Member 1
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ISecondaryMemberBetweenPointsFeatureData::SecondaryMemberOffsetType
is set to
swSecondaryMemberBetweenPointsDistanceFromEndType_e
.swSecondaryMemberBetweenPointsDistanceFromEndType_Distance.
